practice.filters.sessionLength: {count, plural, one {# question session} other {# question session}}
app.loading.title: Loading the app
app.loading.description: Hang tight while we prep your workspace.
auth.login.title: Welcome back
auth.login.invalidCredentials: Incorrect email or password. Try again or reset your password.
auth.login.emailNotConfirmed: Confirm your email from the message we sent before signing in.
auth.login.rateLimited: Too many sign-in attempts. Wait a moment and try again.
auth.login.serviceUnavailable: Sign in is temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.
auth.login.resetDescription: Enter the email linked to your account and we'll send a secure password reset link.
auth.login.resetSuccess: Password reset email sent to {email}. Check your inbox to continue.
auth.login.resetErrorFallback: Unable to send password reset email
auth.login.resetRateLimited: You're requesting password emails too quickly. Wait a moment and try again.
auth.login.resetServiceUnavailable: Password reset is temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.
auth.login.inviteNote: Invite codes are issued by administrators—reach out to your program lead for the latest credentials before submitting the signup form.
auth.signup.success: Account created. Check your email to confirm before signing in.
auth.signup.title: Join {app}
auth.signup.serviceUnavailable: Signup is temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.
auth.signup.accountExists: An account already exists for that email. Sign in instead.
auth.signup.inviteRequired: Enter the invite code provided by your program lead.
auth.signup.inviteInvalid: That invite code isn’t recognized. Double-check the latest code.
auth.signup.inviteExpired: That invite code has expired. Request a fresh invite before signing up.
auth.reset.loadingDescription: Hang tight while we confirm your secure password reset link.
auth.reset.invalidDescription: Request a new password reset email from the login page to continue.
auth.reset.title: Choose a new password
auth.reset.description: Enter and confirm a new password to finish resetting your account.
auth.reset.passwordLength: Passwords must be at least 12 characters.
auth.reset.successDescription: You can continue to the dashboard with your new password.
admin.settings.resetConfirm: This will clear all-time leaderboard scores. Continue?
admin.settings.heading: Admin Settings
games.index.heading: Learning games
games.index.description: Reinforce high-yield patterns through focused mini-games alongside your question bank practice.
games.index.cards.murmurs.title: Guess the Murmur
games.index.cards.murmurs.description: Match classic auscultation findings with the correct lesion after listening to real audio clips.
games.index.cards.cxr.title: CXR Match
games.index.cards.cxr.description: Drop labels onto congenital heart disease radiographs to reinforce imaging patterns.
games.index.cards.ekg.title: Read the EKG
games.index.cards.ekg.description: Practice spotting hallmark arrhythmias and conduction disturbances on 12-lead tracings.
